name: v0.59.0
body:
## What's Changed
**BREAKING CHANGE**: Remove kakfa package and tests by @kschlarman in https://github.com/netlify/netlify-commons/pull/278

To upgrade:
    - If the `kafka` package is not being used, no changes necessary
    - If the `kafka` package is being used, add https://github.com/netlify/kafka-commons to the `go.mod` and fix imports.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netlify/netlify-commons/compare/v0.58.10...v0.59.0

Allow specifying custom featureflag atributes 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/netlify/netlify-commons/compare/v0.58.0...v0.58.1

name: v0.58.0
body: Adds a `service` tag to metrics and traces if unset globally.

name: v0.57.0
body: * Upgrades the mongo-go-driver to 1.5.1 -> 1.7.3, see the [changelog](https://github.com/mongodb/mongo-go-driver/releases) for more details

name: Bug fixes
body:
- Fixes race condition on `Distribution` which caused invalid metric labels to reported
- Fixes race condition on `PersistentGauge` which caused writes to a closed metrics queue when using the statsd sink.
- Fixes `SafeHTTPClient` so that it avoids fetching connections from the underlying pool when checking for forbidden host IPs.

name: v0.56.0
body: feat: added serializable URL type

name: v0.55.1
body: chore: WithServiceName is deprecated, replace
* fix: omit empty pinned_version when serializing plugins config

name: v0.35.0
body: Adds pprof lib

- remove graceful
- add banlist
- fix router check auth error

name: v0.19.0
body:
## Changed
- [router] HealthCheck middleware only handles non-nil errors.

## Fixed
- [messaging] Update nats version and cleanup config .

name: v0.18.0
body:
### Added
- Add a generic router interface 
- RootArg structure for easier config

name: Implement more NATS Auth methods
body:
Add new auth methods for connecting with NATS clusters:
* user/password auth
* token auth

name: Support YAML syntax for config files
body: Config files can use YAML syntax now

name: Better MongoDB configuration
body: MongoDB driver supports configuring a Replica Set
